data.eml:eml: New Notophthiracarus species (Acarina, Oribatida, Phthiracaridae) and overview of the distribution of the genus in South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niedbała, Wojciech, Hugo-Coetzee, Elizabeth A., Ermilov, Sergey G. (2019): New Notophthiracarus species (Acarina, Oribatida, Phthiracaridae) and overview of the distribution of the genus in South Africa. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 231-240, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.16
